titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce the maximum contribution amount that a multicandidate political committee (PAC) may make to a candidate for Federal office. Limits contributions to House of Representatives candidates from: (1) PACs; and (2) persons other than local individual residents.
